get.description: Retrieves general information about other related products that the users also saw

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Product unique identifier

sellers.sellerName: COMPANHIA BRASILEIRA DE TECNOLOGIA PARA E-COMMERCE

productTitle.title: productTitle
productTitle.description: Text that is in the browser tab and corresponds to the title of the product page. This field is important for SEO.

metaTagDescription.title: metaTagDescription
metaTagDescription.description: Brief description of the category. It's recommended that you don't exceed 150 characters so that the search engines can display it correctly in the results page.

categories.title: categories
categories.description: Array of the product's categories URLs.

categoriesIds.title: categoriesIds
categoriesIds.description: Array of the product's categories IDs.

allSpecificationsGroups.title: allSpecificationsGroups
allSpecificationsGroups.description: Array of the product's specifications groups.

description.title: description
description.description: Description of the main information related to the product. A simple and easy to understand summary for the customer.

items.title: items
items.description: Array containing the product SKU general information.

sellers.sellerName: COMPANHIA BRASILEIRA DE TECNOLOGIA PARA E-COMMERCE
COMPANHIA BRASILEIRA DE TECNOLOGIA PARA E-COMMERCE

ean.title: ean
ean.description: SKU unique identification code (barcode), accepts up to 13 numerical characters.

Value.title: Value
Value.description: Unique reference code used internally for organizational purposes.

measurementUnit.title: measurementUnit
measurementUnit.description: Used only in cases when you need to convert the unit of measure for sale. In common cases, use 'un'.

unitMultiplier.title: unitMultiplier
unitMultiplier.description: numerical unit that multiplies the selected quantity of the product when it is inserted in the cart.

isKit.title: isKit
isKit.description: If the SKU is part of a kit.

kitItems.title: kitItems
kitItems.description: Array with information of SKUs components from a Kit.

amount.title: amount
amount.description: Amount of the SKU component in the kit.

images.title: images
images.description: Array of information about the SKU image.

imageLastModified.title: imageLastModified
imageLastModified.description: Date and time of the last update of the image.

default.sellerName: COMPANHIA BRASILEIRA DE TECNOLOGIA PARA E-COMMERCE

sellerDefault.title: sellerDefault
sellerDefault.description: If the seller is default or not.
